Title: Radiant Warnings
Description:
So she goes by Harbinger now, does she? How fitting.

I no longer feel her presence, but make no mistake. Xal'atath's nefarious games continue. And Alleria is now a pawn upon her board.

As are you, champion of fate.
ObjectivesText: Deliver Locus-Walker's warning to Khadgar in Dalaran.
